importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The outage began around 3 a.m. ET on Monday, October 20, 2025, when Amazon reported increased error rates and latencies in its Northern Virginia facility, triggering widespread disruptions across dependent services.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The outage started early Monday morning at approximately 3 a.m. ET and continued into the evening, affecting services throughout the day and resulting in ongoing disruptions as of Monday evening.

keyTakeAways: A major outage at Amazon Web Services (AWS) disrupted numerous major websites and applications, including Duolingo, Roblox, Fortnite, Coinbase, Robinhood, Venmo, Perplexity, ChatGPT, United Airlines, Canva, Reddit, Flickr, and The New York Times Games.
The root cause was a software update with an error in AWS's DynamoDB database service, located in Northern Virginia, which triggered a chain reaction of failures across dependent services.
AWS is a critical cloud computing backbone, powering much of the internet and enabling companies to store and manage data online.
The incident illustrates how heavily dependent modern businesses are on a small number of technology providers, highlighting systemic vulnerability in digital infrastructure.
Experts note that while using AWS offers convenience and strong cybersecurity, it also creates significant risk when outages occur, as seen in the domino effect of failures.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A major outage at Amazon Web Services (AWS) disrupted numerous websites and applications, including Duolingo, Roblox, Fortnite, Coinbase, Robinhood, Venmo, Perplexity, ChatGPT, United Airlines, Canva, Reddit, Flickr, and The New York Times Games. The root cause was an error in a software update to AWS’s DynamoDB database service in Northern Virginia, which triggered a chain reaction of failures. AWS acts as a critical cloud infrastructure backbone for many businesses, and the incident highlights the extreme vulnerability of modern digital services to outages in a single provider. Experts note that while cloud services offer convenience and security, they also create systemic risks due to overreliance on a few dominant companies like AWS, Microsoft, and Google. This event underscores the fragility of the internet’s infrastructure and the need for greater resilience and diversification in cloud computing.
title: Outage at Amazon Web Services disrupts websites across the internet
